Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class TutorialController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.TutorialController
public class TutorialController
extends java.lang.Object

The Class TutorialController is the controller class of tutorial.fxml. Initialize the tutorial scene, define media mouse events and load the video resource.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/28-19:20

    • ReturnMenu

      public void ReturnMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Mouse event method, click the button set the scene to menu scene.
